title: How to set-up GDB debugging in IDA Pro on Linux via Wine?
content:
I tried running on linux via root terminal: 
gdbserver --multi localhost:23947
And then at IDA Pro at Wine I use Remote GDB debugger with my local ip and port: However when I start debugging I think registers receive wrong values: Any ideas how to fix this? I'm running latest version of Opensuse Tumbleweed and IDA PRO 6.6 x64 Win32 under Wine.

comments.text: You will likely need to talk with [emailÂ protected]
